hero.title: Expert Automotive Engineering
hero.subtitle: Car Body Specialists
hero.description: Specialized in car body design, development, manufacturing, and comprehensive vehicle restoration services.

about.title: Leading Truck Engineering Excellence
about.subtitle: About Dereje Tura Engineering
about.description: Established in 1999, Dereje Tura Engineering has been at the forefront of heavy-duty vehicle engineering in Ethiopia. We specialize in comprehensive truck body manufacturing, modifications, and expert repairs. Our state-of-the-art facility and skilled team ensure the highest standards of quality and reliability in every project.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To provide exceptional automotive engineering solutions with unmatched quality and customer satisfaction.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the leading automotive engineering company in Ethiopia, setting industry standards for excellence.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: What We Offer
services.description: Comprehensive automotive solutions for all your vehicle needs

design.title: Custom Truck Body Manufacturing
design.description: Custom design solutions for vehicle bodies with modern aesthetics and functionality

restoration.title: Vehicle Restoration
restoration.description: Complete restoration services to bring classic cars back to their original glory

repair.title: Accident Repair
repair.description: Professional repair services for accident-damaged vehicles

modification.title: Professional Modification Services
modification.description: Specialized vehicle modifications to meet specific requirements

testimonials.title: What our clients say about Us
testimonials.subtitle: Testimonial

contact.title: Get in Touch with Us
contact.description: We're here to help with all your automotive engineering needs. Contact us for expert consultation, repairs, or custom solutions.

footer.aboutDescription: Specialized automotive engineering company providing comprehensive vehicle solutions in Addis Ababa

identify.title: Expert Assessment
identify.description: Our specialists conduct thorough inspections to assess vehicle condition, damage extent, and required repairs or modifications.

prepare.title: Custom Solution Design
prepare.description: We develop detailed engineering solutions, from repair plans to custom body modifications, tailored to each vehicle's needs.

working.title: Professional Execution
working.description: Our skilled team implements the solutions using state-of-the-art equipment and proven automotive engineering techniques.

deliver.title: Quality Assurance
deliver.description: Every vehicle undergoes rigorous testing and quality checks before delivery to ensure safety and performance standards.
